lyrics:
63 contributorstranslationstürkçeespañoladele  i drink wine srpski prevodportuguêsdeutschفارسیpolskifrançaisi drink wine lyricsverse 1

were in love with the world but the world just wants to bring us down
by puttin ideas in our heads that corrupt our hearts somehow
when i was a child every single thing could blow my mind
soaking it all up for fun but now i only soak up wine
they say to play hard you work hard find balance in the sacrifice
and yet i dont know anybody whos truly satisfied

prechorus
you better believe im tryin tryin tryin
to keep climbin climbin climbin
but the higher we climb feels like were both none the wiser

chorus
so i hope i learn to get over myself
stop tryin to be somebody else
so we can love each other for free
everybody wants somethin you just want me

verse 2

see adele liveget tickets as low as 151you might also likeprechorus

high tides high tides high tides

chorus

stop tryin to be somebody else

chorus
well i hope i learn to get over myself
stop tryin to be somebody else

outro
the only regret i have
i wish that it was just at a different time
a most turbulent period of my life
why would i put that on you
thats just like a very heavy thing to have to talk about
but because of that period of time
even though it was so much fun
